isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR 3176 - SYSTEM COMPONENTS AND OPERATION - WELDING

warning.para: Disconnect both the positive (+) and negative (-) battery cables from the battery before welding on the vehicle. Attach the welder ground cable as close as possible to the part being welded. Do not connect the ground cable of the welder to the cooling plate or control module(s). To protect the control module(s) computer circuits, it is mandatory to remove all connectors going to the control module(s).
